bug.short_desc: [update] cannot install Mylyn from update site

long_desc.thetext:
Build ID: I20071213-1700 (3.4M4)
Steps To Reproduce: I tried to install the latest mylyn version from download.eclipse.org/tools/mylyn/update/weekly/e3.4 onto eclipse 3.4M4 and I get the following error from the update dialog:
Current configuration contains errors that are not corrected by the requested operation and more errors would be introduced. See details for more information. ----- Current configuration problems ----- Eclipse Platform Extensions (3.3.0.0) requires plug-in "org.eclipse.core.resources (3.3.0)", or equivalent. ----- Configuration problems after the operation ----- Eclipse Platform Extensions (3.3.0.0) requires plug-in "org.eclipse.core.resources (3.3.0)", or equivalent. Mylyn Bridge: Eclipse IDE (2.2.0.I20080102-2100) requires feature "org.eclipse.mylyn_feature (2.2.0.qualifier)", or later version. Mylyn Bridge: Java Development (2.2.0.I20080102-2100) requires feature "org.eclipse.mylyn_feature (2.2.0.qualifier)", or later version. Mylyn Bridge: PDE, CVS and Ant (2.2.0.I20080102-2100) requires feature "org.eclipse.mylyn_feature (2.2.0.qualifier)", or later version. Mylyn Connector: Bugzilla (2.2.0.I20080102-2100) requires feature "org.eclipse.mylyn_feature (2.2.0.qualifier)", or later version. Mylyn Connector: Trac (2.2.0.I20080102-2100) requires feature "org.eclipse.mylyn_feature (2.2.0.qualifier)", or later version.
Looking at my eclipse installation I have org.eclipse.core.resources (3.4.0.0)
More information:
Should now be fixed. The new build is still replicating to mirrors but should be available within the hour. The fixed version is 2.3.0.I20080103-1700.
*** Bug 214270 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
